meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> has a <radical>book</radical> all about the human <kanji>body</kanji>. Knowing about bodies is a privilege. One that only leaders get—it helps them control all their subjects, like you.
readingMnemonic: The leader's <kanji>body</kanji> book also taught her about something very body specific: how to tie a <reading>tie</reading> (たい). You can't have a tie on your body, no no. Those are for the leader and her smart body.
